faq_description:
Agreement & Declaration

Important: Please read and acknowledge before submitting

  1. I agree to participate in the POSB CDA Baby’s First Flight Promotion ("Promotion") and accept the terms and conditions of the Promotion.
  2. I agree that the Bassinet seats are subject to availability and offered on a first-come, first-served basis. I will not hold POSB liable for any defects, malfunction or any issue arising from the use of the Bassinet seats.
  3. I confirm that my child is an existing POSB Smiley CDA account holder and is eligible to enjoy the Promotion.
  4. I confirm that the contents of this redemption are true, complete and accurate in all respects, and that the Bank may rely on the information of this registration to contact me for purpose of this Promotion. I consent to DBS’ collection and use of my personal data and the use and disclosure of my personal data by DBS to Singapore Airlines ("SIA") and any other third party as DBS reasonably deems necessary for the purpose of the Promotion. I agree to the terms of the DBS Privacy Policy.
  5. I confirm that my child details provided above are accurate. For any changes required, please contact the Singapore Airlines office nearest to you. A USD50 service fee will apply for any ticket change. Contact details and service fees details are available on
